alert.note: Alert for Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 1:55PM PST until January 11 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total new snow accumulations of up to 3 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph over exposed terrain. * WHERE...South Central Oregon Cascades and Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades. This includes Diamond Lake Junction, Crater Lake and Lake Of The Woods. This also includes highways 62, 138, 230, 58, and 140 in the Cascades. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM PST this evening. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Isolated power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will increase from 2500 feet Thursday night up to 5500 feet Saturday. Most of the snow will fall on Cascades with up to 1 foot in the Siskiyous. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. Do not detour during winter storms. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors. * A Winter Storm Warning means that severe winter weather is likely and poses a threat to life and property. Take protective action now.

area.areaDesc: Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades
